br.com.caelum.vraptor.view

Class DefaultHttpResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.DefaultHttpResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View, HttpResult

    @RequestScoped
public class DefaultHttpResult
extends Object
implements HttpResult
    Implementation that delegates to HttpServletResponse
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti, Sergio Lopes
